member.name: AUDIOCLIENT_PROCESS_LOOPBACK_PARAMS
member.summary: Specifies parameters for a call to where loopback activation is requested.

member.name: AUDIOCLIENT_PROCESS_LOOPBACK_PARAMS.TargetProcessId
member.summary: The ID of the process for which the render streams, and the render streams of its child processes, will be included or excluded when activating the process loopback stream.

member.name: AUDIOCLIENT_PROCESS_LOOPBACK_PARAMS.ProcessLoopbackMode
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying whether the render streams for the process and child processes specified in the TargetProcessId field should be included or excluded when activating the audio interface. For sample code that demonstrates the process loopback capture scenario, see the Application Loopback API Capture Sample.
